body: * this method must be overridden by sub class.

@param.description:
@param, For Method;
- Nullable: `@param {?number} param`, 
- Not Nullable: `@param {!Object} param`
- Union: `@param {number|string} param`
- Nullable and Union: `@param {?(number|string)} param`
- Spread: `@param {...number} param`
- Optional: `@param {number} [param]`
- Default: `@param {number} [param=10]`
- Function: `@param {function(foo: number, bar: string): boolean} param`
- Generics: `@param {Map<number, string>} param`
- Record: `@param {{foo: ?number, bar: string}} param`

@param (single).description:
@param, For Method;
- Nullable: `@param {?number} param`, 
- Not Nullable: `@param {!Object} param`
- Union: `@param {number|string} param`
- Nullable and Union: `@param {?(number|string)} param`
- Spread: `@param {...number} param`
- Optional: `@param {number} [param]`
- Default: `@param {number} [param=10]`
- Function: `@param {function(foo: number, bar: string): boolean} param`
- Generics: `@param {Map<number, string>} param`
- Record: `@param {{foo: ?number, bar: string}} param`
